      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Transmission and absorption of radio waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übertragung und Absorption der Funkwellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transmission et absorption des ondes radio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transmissão e absorption das ondas de rádio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasmissione ed assorbimento delle onde radio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετάδοση και απορρόφηση των ραδιο κυμάτων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transmisión y absorción de las ondas de radio</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows that radio waves pass easily through air (a) and dry non-metals (b) and that they are absorbed by aerials (b) and water (c).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">absorption</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">aerials</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">air</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dry non-metals</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">radio</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Radio waves</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">television</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">transmission</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">water</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt, daß Funkwellen leicht 
durch Luft (a) und trockene Nichtmetalle (b) überschreiten und daß 
sie durch Antennen (b) und Wasser (c) aufgesogen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration prouve que les ondes radio 
passent facilement par l'air (a) et les non-métaux secs (b) et 
qu'elles sont absorbées par les antennes (b) et l'eau (c).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra que as ondas de rádio 
passam fàcilmente através do ar (a) e dos não-metais secos (b) e 
que estão absorvidas pelas antenas (b) e pela água (c).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione indica che le onde radio 
passano facilmente attraverso aria (a) ed i metalloidi asciutti (b) e 
che sono assorbite dalle antenne (b) e dall'acqua (c).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση δείχνει ότι τα ραδιο κύματα 
περνούν εύκολα μέσω του αέρα (α) και των ξηρών αμέταλλων (β) και
ότι απορροφώνται από τις κεραίες (β) και το ύδωρ (γ).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra que las ondas de radio 
pasan fácilmente a través del aire (a) y de los no metales secos (b)
y que son absorbidas por las antenas (b) y el agua (c).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Absorption</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
